pullRequest.title: Add ratis size related configuration
pullRequest.bodyText: Add ratis configuration so that users can change it when they have larger journal entries (e.g. introduced by Alluxio catalog service).

nodes.bodyText: Do we need two different properties? They looks quite similar in name and description.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1549,6 +1549,22 @@ public String toString() {
           .setConsistencyCheckLevel(ConsistencyCheckLevel.WARN)
           .setScope(Scope.MASTER)
           .build();
+  public static final PropertyKey MASTER_EMBEDDED_JOURNAL_FLUSH_SIZE_MAX =
+      new Builder(Name.MASTER_EMBEDDED_JOURNAL_FLUSH_SIZE_MAX)
+          .setDefaultValue("64MB")
+          .setDescription("The maximum size in bytes of journal entries allowed "
+              + "in concurrent journal flushing (journal IO to standby masters "
+              + "and IO to local disks.")
+          .setConsistencyCheckLevel(ConsistencyCheckLevel.WARN)
+          .setScope(Scope.MASTER)
+          .build();
+  public static final PropertyKey MASTER_EMBEDDED_JOURNAL_JOURNAL_SIZE_MAX =

nodes.bodyText: This name is a duplicate of something else?

Would MASTER_EMBEDDED_JOURNAL_ENTRY_SIZE_MAX make more sense?
and alluxio.master.embedded.journal.entry.size.max
Should/can this be larger? Is there any downside for a larger max size?

           .setConsistencyCheckLevel(ConsistencyCheckLevel.WARN)

+  public static final PropertyKey MASTER_EMBEDDED_JOURNAL_FLUSH_SIZE_MAX =

+          .setDefaultValue("64MB")
+          .setDescription("The maximum size in bytes of journal entries allowed "

+          .setConsistencyCheckLevel(ConsistencyCheckLevel.WARN)

commit.message: Update entry size max name and description
